       const handleSelectCompany = (companyId: string, checked: boolean) => {
         const newSelected = new Set(selectedCompanies);
         if (checked) {
           newSelected.add(companyId);
         } else {
           newSelected.delete(companyId);
         }
         setSelectedCompanies(newSelected);
       };
       ```

    41â†’  const [itemsPerPage, setItemsPerPage] = useState(20);
    42â†’  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<SortField>('id');
    43â†’  const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<SortOrder>('desc');
    44â†’  const [selectedHostAccounts, setSelectedHostAccounts] = useState<Set<string>>(new Set());

    72â†’
    73â†’      return matchesSearch;
    74â†’    });
    75â†’  }, [data, searchTerm]);
    76â†’
    77â†’  // Sort logic
    78â†’  const sortedData = useMemo(() => {
    79â†’    const sorted = [...filteredData].sort((a, b) => {
    80â†’      let aVal: any = a[sortField];
    81â†’      let bVal: any = b[sortField];
    82â†’
    83â†’      // Handle null values
    84â†’      if (aVal === null || aVal === undefined) aVal = '';
    85â†’      if (bVal === null || bVal === undefined) bVal = '';
    86â†’
    87â†’      // Handle object values (like host_company) by converting to string
    88â†’      if (typeof aVal === 'object') aVal = '';
    89â†’      if (typeof bVal === 'object') bVal = '';
    90â†’
    91â†’      // Convert to lowercase for string comparison
    92â†’      if (typeof aVal === 'string') {
    93â†’        aVal = aVal.toLowerCase();
    94â†’        bVal = (bVal as string).toLowerCase();
    95â†’      }
    96â†’
    97â†’      if (sortOrder === 'asc') {
    98â†’        return aVal > bVal ? 1 : -1;
    99â†’      } else {
   100â†’        return aVal < bVal ? 1 : -1;
   101â†’      }
   102â†’    });
   103â†’
   104â†’    return sorted;
   105â†’  }, [filteredData, sortField, sortOrder]);
   106â†’
   107â†’  // Pagination logic
   108â†’  const paginatedData = useMemo(() => {
   109â†’    const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;

   111â†’    return sortedData.slice(startIndex, endIndex);
   112â†’  }, [sortedData, currentPage, itemsPerPage]);
   113â†’
   114â†’  const totalPages = Math.ceil(sortedData.length / itemsPerPage);
   115â†’
   116â†’  // Handle sort
   117â†’  const handleSort = (field: SortField) => {
   118â†’    if (sortField === field) {
   119â†’      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');

   121â†’      setSortField(field);
   122â†’      setSortOrder('asc');

   140â†’    if (checked) {
   141â†’      newSelected.add(hostAccountId);

   151â†’    }
   152â†’  };
   153â†’
   154â†’  // Handle company checkbox selection

   158â†’      newSelected.add(companyId);
   159â†’    } else {
   160â†’      newSelected.delete(companyId);
   161â†’    }
   162â†’    setSelectedCompanies(newSelected);
   163â†’  };
   164â†’
   165â†’  const truncateText = (text: string | null, maxLength: number = 30) => {
   166â†’    if (!text) return '-';
   167â†’    return text.length > maxLength ? text.substring(0, maxLength) + '...' : text;
   168â†’  };
   169â†’
   170â†’  const maskPassword = (password: string | null) => {
   171â†’    if (!password) return '-';
   172â†’    return 'â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢';
   173â†’  };
   174â†’
   175â†’  const maskApiKey = (apiKey: string | null) => {
   176â†’    if (!apiKey) return '-';
   177â†’    if (apiKey.length <= 8) return 'â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢';
   178â†’    return apiKey.substring(0, 4) + 'â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢' + apiKey.substring(apiKey.length - 4);
   179â†’  };
   180â†’
   181â†’  // Inline editing functions
   182â†’  const handleCellClick = (id: string, field: string, currentValue: any) => {
   183â†’    // Define which fields are editable
   184â†’    const editableFields = [
   185â†’      'username', 'pass', 'hostacct_apikey1', 'hostacct_api_secret', 'api_management_url',
   186â†’      'host_company_name', 'host_company_portal_url1', 'host_company_notes1', 
   187â†’      'host_company_notes2', 'host_company_notes3'
   188â†’    ];
   189â†’    
   190â†’    if (!editableFields.includes(field)) {
   191â†’      return; // Only allow editing specified fields
   192â†’    }
   193â†’    setEditingCell({ id, field });
   194â†’    setEditValue(currentValue?.toString() || '');
   195â†’  };
   196â†’
   197â†’  const handleCellSave = async () => {
   198â†’    if (!editingCell || isSaving) return;
   199â†’    
   200â†’    const { id, field } = editingCell;
   201â†’    setIsSaving(true);
   202â†’    
   203â†’    try {
   204â†’      await updateField(id, field, editValue);
   205â†’      setEditingCell(null);
   206â†’      setEditValue('');
   207â†’      
   208â†’      // Refresh the data
   209â†’      if (onDataChange) {
   210â†’        onDataChange();
   211â†’      }
   212â†’    } catch (error) {
   213â†’      console.error('Error updating API key:', error);
   214â†’      setFetchError('Failed to update API key');
   215â†’    } finally {
   216â†’      setIsSaving(false);
   217â†’    }
   218â†’  };
   219â†’
   220â†’  const handleCellCancel = () => {
   221â†’    setEditingCell(null);
   222â†’    setEditValue('');
   223â†’  };
   224â†’
   225â†’  const updateField = async (id: string, field: string, newValue: string) => {
   226â†’    const supabase = createClient(
   227â†’      process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL!,
   228â†’      process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY!
   229â†’    );
   230â†’
   231â†’    let updateData: any = {};
   232â†’    let tableName = 'host_account';
   233â†’    let whereClause = { id };
   234â†’
   235â†’    // Handle host_company fields differently
   236â†’    if (field.startsWith('host_company_')) {
   237â†’      const companyField = field.replace('host_company_', '');
   238â†’      const item = data.find(d => d.id === id);
   239â†’      if (!item?.host_company?.id) {
   240â†’        throw new Error('Host company not found');
   241â†’      }
   242â†’      
   243â†’      tableName = 'host_company';
   244â†’      whereClause = { id: item.host_company.id };
   245â†’      updateData[companyField] = newValue;
   246â†’      
   247â†’      // Only add updated_at for host_company table if it exists
   248â†’      updateData.updated_at = new Date().toISOString();
   249â†’    } else {
   250â†’      // Handle host_account fields - don't add updated_at since it doesn't exist
   251â†’      updateData[field] = newValue;
   252â†’    }
   253â†’
   254â†’    const { error } = await supabase
   255â†’      .from(tableName)
   256â†’      .update(updateData)
   257â†’      .eq('id', whereClause.id);
   258â†’
   259â†’    if (error) {
   260â†’      throw new Error(error.message);
   261â†’    }
   262â†’  };
   263â†’
   264â†’  const copyToClipboard = async (text: string) => {
   265â†’    try {
   266â†’      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
   267â†’    } catch (err) {
   268â†’      console.error('Failed to copy text: ', err);
   269â†’    }
   270â†’  };
   271â†’

   358â†’
   359â†’  const handleFetchDomains = async () => {
   360â†’    const selectedId = Array.from(selectedHostAccounts)[0];
   361â†’    const selectedAccount = data.find(account => account.id === selectedId);
   362â†’    
   363â†’    if (!selectedAccount) {
   364â†’      setFetchError('Selected account not found');
   365â†’      return;
   366â†’    }
   367â†’
   368â†’    setIsLoading(true);
   369â†’    setFetchError(null);
   370â†’
   371â†’    try {
   372â†’      console.log('Fetching domains for account:', selectedAccount);
   373â†’      
   374â†’      const response = await fetch('/api/fetch-domains', {
   375â†’        method: 'POST',
   376â†’        headers: {
   377â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   378â†’        },
   379â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
   380â†’          host_account_id: selectedAccount.id
   381â†’        })
   382â†’      });
   383â†’
   384â†’      const result = await response.json();
   385â†’
   386â†’      if (result.success) {
   387â†’        console.log('Successfully fetched domains:', result);
   388â†’        // Refresh the data to show updated domains_glacier
   389â†’        if (onDataChange) {
   390â†’          onDataChange();
   391â†’        }
   392â†’      } else {
   393â†’        console.error('Error fetching domains:', result.error);
   394â†’        setFetchError(result.error);
   395â†’      }
   396â†’    } catch (error) {
   397â†’      console.error('Error calling fetch domains API:', error);
   398â†’      setFetchError('Network error occurred while fetching domains');
   399â†’    } finally {
   400â†’      setIsLoading(false);
   401â†’    }
   402â†’  };
   403â†’
   404â†’  const handleCreateNewHostAccount = async () => {
   405â†’    if (selectedCompanies.size !== 1) {
   406â†’      setFetchError('Please select exactly one company to create a host account');
   407â†’      return;
   408â†’    }
   409â†’
   410â†’    setIsLoading(true);
   411â†’    setFetchError(null);
   412â†’
   413â†’    try {
   414â†’      const selectedCompanyId = Array.from(selectedCompanies)[0];
   415â†’      const selectedCompanyData = data.find(item => item.host_company?.id === selectedCompanyId);
   416â†’      
   417â†’      if (!selectedCompanyData?.host_company) {
   418â†’        setFetchError('Selected company not found');
   419â†’        return;
   420â†’      }
   421â†’
   422â†’      const supabase = createClient(
   423â†’        process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL!,
   424â†’        process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY!
   425â†’      );
   426â†’
   427â†’      // Create new host account
   428â†’      const { data: newAccount, error } = await supabase
   429â†’        .from('host_account')
   430â†’        .insert([
   431â†’          {
   432â†’            fk_host_company_id: selectedCompanyId,
   433â†’            fk_user_id: selectedCompanyData.host_company.fk_user_id,
   434â†’            username: null,
   435â†’            pass: null,
   436â†’            hostacct_apikey1: null,
   437â†’            hostacct_api_secret: null,
   438â†’            api_management_url: null,
   439â†’            domains_glacier: null
   440â†’          }
   441â†’        ])
   442â†’        .select();
   443â†’
   444â†’      if (error) {
   445â†’        console.error('Error creating host account:', error);
   446â†’        setFetchError('Failed to create host account: ' + error.message);
   447â†’        return;
   448â†’      }
   449â†’
   450â†’      console.log('Successfully created new host account:', newAccount);
   451â†’      
   452â†’      // Refresh the data to show the new host account
   453â†’      if (onDataChange) {
   454â†’        onDataChange();
   455â†’      }
   456â†’
   457â†’      // Clear company selection after successful creation
   458â†’      setSelectedCompanies(new Set());
   459â†’      
   460â†’    } catch (error) {
   461â†’      console.error('Error creating host account:', error);
   462â†’      setFetchError('Network error occurred while creating host account');
   463â†’    } finally {
   464â†’      setIsLoading(false);
   465â†’    }
   466â†’  };
   467â†’
   468â†’  return (
   469â†’    <div className="space-y-4">
   470â†’      {/* Search */}
   471â†’      <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
   472â†’        <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
   473â†’          <input
   474â†’            type="text"
   475â†’            placeholder="Search host accounts..."
   476â†’            className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent"
   477â†’            value={searchTerm}
   478â†’            onChange={(e) => {
   479â†’              setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
   480â†’              setCurrentPage(1);
   481â†’            }}
   482â†’          />
   483â†’        </div>
   484â†’      </div>
   485â†’
   486â†’      {/* Results count */}
   487â†’      <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
   488â†’        Showing {paginatedData.length} of {sortedData.length} results
   489â†’      </div>
   490â†’
   491â†’      {/* Table */}
   492â†’      <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow overflow-hidden">
   493â†’        <div className="overflow-x-auto">
   494â†’          <table className="w-full text-sm">
   495â†’            <thead className="bg-gray-50">
   496â†’              <tr>
   497â†’                {/* Company checkbox column */}
   498â†’                <th className="px-4 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
   499â†’                  <span className="text-xs">Company â˜</span>
   500â†’                </th>
   501â†’                {/* Host Company columns on the left */}
   502â†’                <th className="px-4 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
   503â†’                  company.id
   504â†’                </th>
   505â†’                <th className="px-4 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">

   568â†’                >
   569â†’                  account.fk_host_company_id {sortField === 'fk_host_company_id' && (sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'â†‘' : 'â†“')}
   570â†’                </th>
   571â†’              </tr>
   572â†’            </thead>
   573â†’            <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200">
   574â†’              {paginatedData.map((item) => {
   575â†’                const isCompanySelected = item.host_company?.id && selectedCompanies.has(item.host_company.id);
   576â†’                const companyColumnClass = isCompanySelected ? "px-4 py-2 bg-yellow-100" : "px-4 py-2";
   577â†’                
   578â†’                return (
   579â†’                <tr key={item.id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
   580â†’                  {/* Company checkbox column */}
   581â†’                  <td className="px-4 py-2 whitespace-nowrap">
   582â†’                    {item.host_company?.id && (
   583â†’                      <input
   584â†’                        type="checkbox"
   585â†’                        checked={selectedCompanies.has(item.host_company.id)}
   586â†’                        onChange={(e) => handleSelectCompany(item.host_company!.id, e.target.checked)}
   587â†’                        className="rounded border-gray-300 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500"
   588â†’                      />
   589â†’                    )}
   590â†’                  </td>
   591â†’                  {/* Host Company columns */}
   592â†’                  <td className={`${companyColumnClass} whitespace-nowrap text-gray-900 text-xs`}>
   593â†’                    {item.host_company ? truncateText(item.host_company.id, 8) + '...' : '-'}
   594â†’                  </td>
   595â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'host_company_name', item.host_company?.name, `${companyColumnClass} text-gray-900 font-medium`)}
   596â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'host_company_portal_url1', item.host_company?.portal_url1, `${companyColumnClass} text-blue-600`, true)}
   597â†’                  <td className={`${companyColumnClass} whitespace-nowrap text-gray-500 text-xs`}>
   598â†’                    {item.host_company ? truncateText(item.host_company.fk_user_id, 8) + '...' : '-'}
   599â†’                  </td>
   600â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'host_company_notes1', item.host_company?.notes1, `${companyColumnClass} text-gray-600`)}
   601â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'host_company_notes2', item.host_company?.notes2, `${companyColumnClass} text-gray-600`)}
   602â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'host_company_notes3', item.host_company?.notes3, `${companyColumnClass} text-gray-600`)}
   603â†’                  {/* Separator column */}
   604â†’                  <td className="px-2 bg-gray-200"></td>
   605â†’                  {/* Checkbox column */}
   606â†’                  <td className="px-4 py-2 whitespace-nowrap">
   607â†’                    <input
   608â†’                      type="checkbox"
   609â†’                      checked={selectedHostAccounts.has(item.id)}
   610â†’                      onChange={(e) => handleSelectHostAccount(item.id, e.target.checked)}
   611â†’                      className="rounded border-gray-300 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500"
   612â†’                    />
   613â†’                  </td>
   614â†’                  {/* Host Account columns */}
   615â†’                  <td className="px-4 py-2 whitespace-nowrap text-gray-900 text-xs">
   616â†’                    {truncateText(item.id, 8)}...
   617â†’                  </td>
   618â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'username', item.username, "px-4 py-2 text-gray-900 font-medium")}
   619â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'pass', item.pass, "px-4 py-2 text-gray-500")}
   620â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'hostacct_apikey1', item.hostacct_apikey1, "px-4 py-2 text-gray-500 font-mono text-xs")}
   621â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'hostacct_api_secret', item.hostacct_api_secret, "px-4 py-2 text-gray-500 font-mono text-xs")}
   622â†’                  {renderEditableCell(item, 'api_management_url', item.api_management_url, "px-4 py-2 text-blue-600", true)}

   624â†’                    {truncateText(item.fk_user_id, 8)}...
   625â†’                  </td>
   626â†’                  <td className="px-4 py-2 whitespace-nowrap text-gray-500 text-xs">
   627â†’                    {item.fk_host_company_id ? truncateText(item.fk_host_company_id, 8) + '...' : '-'}
   628â†’                  </td>
   629â†’                </tr>
   630â†’              ))}
   631â†’              {paginatedData.length === 0 && (
   632â†’                <tr>
   633â†’                  <td colSpan={18} className="px-4 py-8 text-center text-gray-500">
   634â†’                    No host accounts found
   635â†’                  </td>
   636â†’                </tr>
   637â†’              )}
   638â†’            </tbody>
   639â†’          </table>
   640â†’        </div>
   641â†’      </div>
   642â†’
   643â†’      {/* Pagination */}
   644â†’      <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
   645â†’        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">

   647â†’          <select
   648â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
   649â†’            value={itemsPerPage}
   650â†’            onChange={(e) => {
   651â†’              setItemsPerPage(Number(e.target.value));
   652â†’              setCurrentPage(1);
   653â†’            }}
   654â†’          >
   655â†’            <option value={10}>10</option>
   656â†’            <option value={20}>20</option>
   657â†’            <option value={50}>50</option>
   658â†’            <option value={100}>100</option>
   659â†’          </select>
   660â†’        </div>
   661â†’
   662â†’        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   663â†’          <button
   664â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   665â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(1)}
   666â†’            disabled={currentPage === 1}
   667â†’          >
   668â†’            First
   669â†’          </button>
   670â†’          <button
   671â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   672â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(currentPage - 1)}
   673â†’            disabled={currentPage === 1}
   674â†’          >
   675â†’            Previous
   676â†’          </button>
   677â†’          <span className="text-sm text-gray-700">
   678â†’            Page {currentPage} of {totalPages || 1}
   679â†’          </span>
   680â†’          <button
   681â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   682â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(currentPage + 1)}
   683â†’            disabled={currentPage === totalPages || totalPages === 0}
   684â†’          >
   685â†’            Next
   686â†’          </button>
   687â†’          <button
   688â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   689â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(totalPages)}
   690â†’            disabled={currentPage === totalPages || totalPages === 0}
   691â†’          >
   692â†’            Last
   693â†’          </button>
   694â†’        </div>
   695â†’      </div>
   696â†’
   697â†’      {/* Action Button */}
   698â†’      <div className="mt-4 flex flex-col items-center space-y-2">
   699â†’        <button
   700â†’          className="px-6 py-3 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-blue-700 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:bg-gray-400"
   701â†’          onClick={handleFetchDomains}
   702â†’          disabled={selectedHostAccounts.size !== 1 || isLoading}
   703â†’        >
   704â†’          {isLoading ? 'Fetching domains...' : 'fetch domains_glacier'}
   705â†’        </button>
   706â†’        
   707â†’        {fetchError && (
   708â†’          <div className="text-red-600 text-sm bg-red-50 px-3 py-2 rounded-md">
   709â†’            Error: {fetchError}
   710â†’          </div>
   711â†’        )}
   712â†’      </div>
   713â†’
   714â†’      {/* Domains Glacier Text Box */}
   715â†’      <div className="mt-6">
   716â†’        <div className="mb-2">
   717â†’          <span className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-700">
   718â†’            host_account.domains_glacier {selectedHostAccounts.size === 1 && (() => {
   719â†’              const selectedId = Array.from(selectedHostAccounts)[0];
   720â†’              const selectedAccount = data.find(account => account.id === selectedId);
   721â†’              const companyName = selectedAccount?.host_company?.name || 'unknown';
   722â†’              const username = selectedAccount?.username || 'unknown';
   723â†’              return `(${companyName} - ${username})`;
   724â†’            })()}
   725â†’          </span>
   726â†’        </div>
   727â†’        <textarea
   728â†’          className="w-full h-64 px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm font-mono resize-vertical focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent"
   729â†’          placeholder={selectedHostAccounts.size === 1 ? "Domain data will appear here after fetching..." : "Select exactly one host account to view domains_glacier data"}
   730â†’          value={(() => {
   731â†’            if (selectedHostAccounts.size === 1) {
   732â†’              const selectedId = Array.from(selectedHostAccounts)[0];
   733â†’              const selectedAccount = data.find(account => account.id === selectedId);
   734â†’              return selectedAccount?.domains_glacier || '';
   735â†’            }
   736â†’            return '';
   737â†’          })()}
   738â†’          readOnly
   739â†’        />
   740â†’      </div>
   741â†’    </div>
   742â†’  );
   743â†’}
```
